import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Contact extends Component { render() { if(this.props.data){ var name = this.props.data.name; //var street = this.props.data.address.street; var city = this.props.data.city; var state = this.props.data.state; //var zip = this.props.data.address.zip; var phone= this.props.data.phone; var email = this.props.data.email; var message = this.props.data.contactmessage; } return (

Get In Touch.

{message}

Error boy
Your message was sent, thank you!

Address and Phone

{city}, {state}

); } } export default Contact;
